item.title: U
item.description: score:22 Chances: Despite the downgrade, the analyst remained positive about the outlook for the software sector. Artificial intelligence will facilitate the buildout of the metaverse, presenting a growth opportunity for AI and metaverse stocks. Risks: Shares of game engine maker Unity have fallen, indicating a potential risk for investors.
